changeSet.author: xyh
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "PDSCI"."RES_EDUCATION_INFO" ( "EDUCATION_FLOW" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL ENABLE, "USER_FLOW" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) NOT NULL, "GRADUATION_SCHOOL" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "GRADUATION_TIME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "GRADUATION_SPE" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "ACADEMIC_BACKGROUND_ID" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "ACADEMIC_BACKGROUND_NAME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "ACADEMIC_BACKGROUND_FILE" VARCHAR2(200 BYTE), "ACADEMIC_DEGREE_ID" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "ACADEMIC_DEGREE_NAME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "ACADEMIC_DEGREE_FILE" VARCHAR2(200 BYTE), "RECORD_STATUS" VARCHAR2(2 BYTE), "CREATE_TIME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "CREATE_USER_FLOW" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "MODIFY_TIME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "MODIFY_USER_FLOW" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE));

changeSet.author: xyh
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "PDSCI"."RES_PROFESSIONAL_INFO" ( "PROFESSIONAL_FLOW" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL ENABLE, "USER_FLOW" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) NOT NULL, "PROFESSIONAL_TITLE_ID" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "PROFESSIONAL_TITLE_NAME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "TECHNICAL_POSITION_ID" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "TECHNICAL_POSITION_NAME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "TECHNICAL_POSITION_TIME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "CLINICAL_TEACHING_TIME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "RECORD_STATUS" VARCHAR2(2 BYTE), "CREATE_TIME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "CREATE_USER_FLOW" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "MODIFY_TIME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "MODIFY_USER_FLOW" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE));

changeSet.author: xyh
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "PDSCI"."RES_TEACHER_TRAINING_INFO" ( "TRAINING_FLOW" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL ENABLE, "USER_FLOW" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) NOT NULL, "TRAINING_YEAR" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "TRAINING_UNIT" VARCHAR2(100 BYTE), "TRAINING_SPE_ID" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "TRAINING_SPE_NAME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "CERTIFICATE_LEVEL_ID" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "CERTIFICATE_LEVEL_NAME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "CERTIFICATE_NO" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "CERTIFICATE_TIME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "CERTIFICATE_FILE" VARCHAR2(200 BYTE), "RECORD_STATUS" VARCHAR2(2 BYTE), "CREATE_TIME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "CREATE_USER_FLOW" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "MODIFY_TIME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "MODIFY_USER_FLOW" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE));

changeSet.author: xyh
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "PDSCI"."RES_TEACHER_LETTER_INFO" ( "LETTER_FLOW" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL ENABLE, "USER_FLOW" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) NOT NULL, "LETTER_YEAR" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "LETTER_PERIOD" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "LETTER_START_TIME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "LETTER_END_TIME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "LETTER_TIME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "LETTER_FILE" VARCHAR2(200 BYTE), "RECORD_STATUS" VARCHAR2(2 BYTE), "CREATE_TIME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "CREATE_USER_FLOW" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "MODIFY_TIME" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "MODIFY_USER_FLOW" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE));
